disc: Hello! We are Beginner level buddys. We would like to joins your team to grow in our experience.
Hello! We are Intermediate level buddys. We know quite a bit but would still like to joins your team.
Hello! We are Advanced level buddys. We would like to help you for a certain amout of fish.
Hello! We are Expert level buddys. We will teach you how its done.
Hello! We are Professional level buddys. We all own Trolling Rod, what more can we say.
